Error",m.status,m.responseText),c(m.status,m)}),"GET"!==e&&l?(w&&(l=JSON.stringify(l)),f?setTimeout(function(){return m.send(l)},0):m.send(l)):f?setTimeout(function(){return m.send()},0):m.send(),b&&(r=function(){return null!=m.abort?m.abort():void 0},p=setTimeout(r,b)),m):(console.error("AjaxCache Request Error","This browser does not support this operation"),c("500",m),m)},e.prototype.getJsonp=function(e,n){var t,o,r,i,s,c,l,u;return i=null!=n.expire&&n.expire>=0?n.expire:60,r=n.success||function(){},o=n.key||e,u=n.skipCache,c=!0,s="ajaxCacheJsonp"+this.jsonpId++,(t=this.getCache(o,u,c))?void r(t):(window[s]=function(e){return function(n){return e.complete(n,i,o,u,c,r)}}(this),e+=-1===e.indexOf("?")?"?callback="+s:"&callback="+s,l=a(s),l.src=e,void f.appendChild(l))},e.prototype.get=function(e,n){return this.request("GET",e,n)},e.prototype.post=function(e,n){return this.request("POST",e,n)},e}(),window.ajaxCache=new o,r=function(){function e(){}return r;r=a(t),r.src=n,f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectScript=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=a(t),this.insertJsOnScriptTag(r,n,o),f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectLinkTag=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=document.createElement("link"),r.id=t,r.type="text/css",r.rel="stylesheet",r.href=n,f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectStylesheet=function(e,n,t,o){i(n,t,o,null)},e.prototype.defaultHandler=function(e,n,t,o){window["tinyBasketResult"+e]=window["tinyBasketResult"+e]||{},window["tinyBasketResult"+e][t.toString()]=n},e.prototype.getHandler=function(e,n){return"js"===e?n?this.injectScriptTag:this.injectScript:"css"===e?n?this.injectLinkTag:this.injectStylesheet:this.defaultHandler},e.prototype.skipCacheRequestManager=function(e,n){return n.success(e)},e.prototype.getRequestManager=function(e,n){return!n||"js"!==e&&"css"!==e?"jsonp"===e?ajaxCache.getJsonp:ajaxCache.get:this.skipCacheRequestManager},e.prototype.require=function(e,n){var t,o,r,i,s,a,c,l,u,p,g,f,w;if(o=this,e)for(m(e)||(e=[e]),i=0,a=e.length;a>i;i++)l=e[i],w=l.url,f=l.type,u=l.skipCache||n,null==f&&(f=w.split("."),f=f[f.length-1]),r=this.getHandler(f,u),c=this.getRequestManager(f,u),g=l.success||function(){},p=l.sourceMap||"",s=l.id||l.key||"ajax-cache-id-"+Math.round(1e5*Math.random()),"string"==typeof g&&(g=window[g]&&"function"==typeof window[g]?window[g]:function(){}),t=function(e,n,t,r,i){return function(s){n.call(o,e,s,r,i),t(s)}},c(w,d(l,{success:t(f,r,g,s,p)}))},e}(),window.tinyBasket=new r,"undefined"!=typeof n&&n.exports&&(n.exports=window.tinyBasket)},{}]},{},[3]);</script><script>(function(){var n;window.glb=window.glb||{},glb.cdnComponents=glb.cdnComponents||[],glb.cdnComponents.push("menu"),glb.menuReady=!0,n=null!==window.noAutoLoadFN&&window.noAutoLoadFN,n||(glb.fnTimeoutMs=glb.fnTimeoutMs||2e3,null!==glb.fnTimeout&&clearTimeout(glb.fnTimeout),glb.menuReady&&glb.headerReady&&glb.reguaReady?glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig):glb.fnTimeout=setTimeout(function(){return href="http://g1.globo.com/musica/lollapalooza/2017/noticia/chainsmokers-rouba-publico-do-metallica-com-show-obvio-e-truques-de-djs.ghtml" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Chainsmokers rouba público do Metallica com show óbvio e truques de DJs</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Neste sábado no Lollapalooza, duo apelou tanto ao clichê, que pareceu piada.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="3"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="_label_event"><a class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">The xx consegue criar clima  &quot;intimista&quot; diante de multidão de milhares no Lolla </p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Ingleses pareceram surpresos com recepção do público brasileiro e se emocionaram ao final da apresentação.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">Lollapalooza 2017</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">há 4 horas</span></span></div><a href="http://g1.globo.com/musica/lollapalooza/2017/noticia/publico-reclama-de-filas-de-ate-uma-hora-para-comprar-bebidas-no-lollapalooza.ghtml" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Público reclama de filas de até uma hora para comprar bebidas no Lollapalooza</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Pontos espalhados pelo festival vendem cerveja, refrigerante e outras bebidas. Organização mudou método de pagamento em edição deste ano e disse que novidade reduziria filas. </p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="feed-post-body-resumo">Público neste sábado (25) o maior do Lolla SP; banda mostrou músicas novas e Kirk Hammett sapateou na guitarra. </p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div Lolla</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Em cerca de 50 minutos, grupo fez valer a dedicação do povo que esperou 25 anos pelo primeiro show no Brasil, neste sábado de festival.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="9"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia"><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Show das irmãs gêmeas no Lollapalooza, neste sábado, começa lento, mas termina com catarse de fãs e curiosos.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="10"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia"><div class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">Lollapalooza 2017</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">The 1975 estreia no Brasil com pop versátil e vocalista carismático no Lolla</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Banda revelação inglesa fez show lotado com fãs novinhas e vocalista cheio de pose e competente, da new wave ao indie rock. </p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div                 float-right"><div class="area-direita-a"><div class="bastian-card-mobile bastian-card-mobile-trends"><section class="gui-card" data-track-category="cards" id="g1-card-trends"><header class="gui-card-title gui-color-primary-bg"><h3 class="gui-text-title js-card-trends-title"> MAIS LIDAS </h3></header><div class="g1-card-root"><div class="gui-card-content"><ul data-track-action="mais lidas" class="highlights"><li class="highlight"><a class="gui-image-hover" data-track-click="clique | posicao 1" href="http://g1.globo.com/musica/lollapalooza/2017/noticia/tove-lo-sensualiza-mostra-seios-mas-prova-que-tem-energia-e-talento-para-o-lolla.ghtml"><div class="numerozao">

a(o):(m=s(e,n))?(y&&"function"==typeof y&&y(m),f="undefined"!=typeof XDomainRequest&&m instanceof XDomainRequest,m.onload||(m.onload=function(e){return function(){var n;return             Veja mais vídeos do autoesporte
            <i class="gui-icon gui-icon-arrow-right2"></i></a></footer></div><script type="text/javascript">
        (function () {
            var jqueryTimeout;
            var JQUERY_TIMEOUT = 1000;

            var jqueryTimeoutSetup = function() {
                jqueryTimeout = window.setTimeout(postJquerySetup, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
            };

            var postJquerySetup = function() {
                if(typeof $ !== 'undefined' && typeof CardDeVideos !== 'undefined') {
                    var initCard = function() {
                        new CardDeVideos('#card-de-videos-b91196ad-c1bd-4616-89b7-bb55044b7508');
                    };
                    initCard();
                    clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                } else {
                    if(document.readyState !== 'complete') {
                        jqueryTimeoutSetup();
                    }
                    else {
                        clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                        console.log('[Card de Videos] Jquery ou CardDeVideos não foi carregado.');
                    }
                }
            };
            postJquerySetup();
        })();
    </script></div><div class="publicidade publicidade-banner_rm2"><div id="banner_rm2" class="tag-manager-publicidade-container"></div></div><div class="area-direita-b"><div class="bastian-card-mobile bastian-card-mobile-trends"><section class="gui-card" data-track-category="cards" id="g1-card-trends"><header class="gui-card-title gui-color-primary-bg"><h3 class="gui-text-title js-card-trends-title"> MAIS LIDAS </h3></header><div class="g1-card-root"><div class="gui-card-content"><ul data-track-action="mais lidas" class="highlights"><li class="highlight"><a class="gui-image-hover" data-track-click="clique | posicao 1" href="http://g1.globo.com/carros/noticia/uber-suspende-teste-de-carros-autonomos-apos-acidente-nos-eua.ghtml"><div class="numerozao">

             data-servico-card="opiniao"
             data-track-category="cards"
             data-track-action="blogs"><header class="gui-card-title gui-color-primary-bg"><h1 data-track-click="clique | header"
            class="gui-text-title"><a href="http://g1.globo.com/carros/blog/oficina-do-g1/" class="gui-card-title-link" title="OFICINA DO G1">
                    OFICINA DO G1
                </a></h1></header><section class="gui-card-content meio-highlights card-opiniao-auto-size"><div class=""><div class="content nano-content"><a href="http://g1.globo.com/carros/blog/oficina-do-g1/"
               title="A embreagem mostra se você é bom motorista (Marcelo Brandt/G1)" class="card-opiniao-item-wide" ><div class="card-opiniao-foto-wide"
                 data-track-click="clique | foto | posicao 1"><img src="http://s2.glbimg.com/5TRJTDa3zmgXnvSHFB642W6TiMc=/0x0:300x300/120x120/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2016/01/19/denis_marum_img_4803.jpg"

        title="Vai vender seu carro? G1 reúne dicas dos maiores classificados"
        data-caption="Vai vender seu carro? G1 reúne dicas dos maiores classificados"
        class="card-de-videos-item-wide gui-lightbox"
        data-type="video"
        data-video-id="5322462"
        data-short-url="http://glo.bo/2eSxkJ0"
        data-item-order="100%"><div class="gui-image-hover"><div class="gui-image-full gui-video-full"><span class="gui-overlay"></span><span class="gui-icon gui-icon-play1"></span><img src="http://s2.glbimg.com/Y19XmsgpMTN1ZikqUiq-ispoy88=/480x0/filters:max_age(3600)/s03.video.glbimg.com/deo/vi/62/24/5322462"
                    width="480"
                    height="270"
                    class="card-de-videos-item-wide-foto"

                    data-track-click="clique | thumb imagem | posicao 1"/></div><p data-track-click="clique | thumb texto | posicao 1" class="card-de-videos-item-wide-text">Vai vender seu carro? G1 reúne dicas dos maiores classificados</p></div></a></div></div></section></div><script type="text/javascript">
        (function () {
            var jqueryTimeout;
            var JQUERY_TIMEOUT = 1000;

            var jqueryTimeoutSetup = function() {
                jqueryTimeout = window.setTimeout(postJquerySetup, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
            };

            var postJquerySetup = function() {
                if(typeof $ !== 'undefined' && typeof CardDeVideos !== 'undefined') {
                    var initCard = function() {
                        new CardDeVideos('#card-de-videos-8e1854e6-ac2f-4aa3-9360-743733364a7c');
                    };
                    initCard();
                    clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                } else {
                    if(document.readyState !== 'complete') {
                        jqueryTimeoutSetup();
                    }
                    else {
                        clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                        console.log('[Card de Videos] Jquery ou CardDeVideos não foi carregado.');
                    }
                }
            };
            postJquerySetup();
        })();
    </script><div data-track-category="cards" data-track-action="videos" class="gui-card card-de-videos " id="card-de-videos-6e340dda-f61c-42f6-9507-201f756236c3"><header class="gui-card-title gui-color-primary-bg"><h3 class="card-de-videos-custom"><a class="gui-text-title"
                title="GUIA PRÁTICO"
                href="http://g1.globo.com/carros/guia-pratico/videos/"
                data-track-click="clique | titulo">
                GUIA PRÁTICO

            </a></h3></header><section class="gui-card-content card-de-videos-content"><div class="nano"><div class="content nano-content"><a href="http://g1.globo.com/carros/guia-pratico/videos/v/guia-pratico-104-saiba-como-funcionam-os-leiloes-de-carros/4144837/"

            <i class="gui-icon gui-icon-arrow-right2"></i></a></footer></div><script type="text/javascript">
        (function () {
            var jqueryTimeout;
            var JQUERY_TIMEOUT = 1000;

            var jqueryTimeoutSetup = function() {
                jqueryTimeout = window.setTimeout(postJquerySetup, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
            };

            var postJquerySetup = function() {
                if(typeof $ !== 'undefined' && typeof CardDeVideos !== 'undefined') {
                    var initCard = function() {
                        new CardDeVideos('#card-de-videos-6e340dda-f61c-42f6-9507-201f756236c3');
                    };
                    initCard();
                    clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                } else {
                    if(document.readyState !== 'complete') {
                        jqueryTimeoutSetup();
                    }
                    else {
                        clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                        console.log('[Card de Videos] Jquery ou CardDeVideos não foi carregado.');
                    }
                }
            };
            postJquerySetup();
        })();

                  media="screen"
                  href="//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/css/barra-globocom.min.css"
                  type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript">(function(){glb.barra={exibeAssineJa:true,exibeCentral:true,iframe:false};var s=document.createElement("script");s.type="text/javascript";s.async=true;s.charset="utf-8";s.src="//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/js/barra-globocom.min.js";var ss=document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];ss.parentNode.insertBefore(s,ss);})();</script><script type="text/javascript">
(function() {
    'use strict';

    var timerId ; // Current timer handler
    var refreshTime = 300000; // 1000*60*5
    var graceTimerStep = 10000; // 1000*10

    var isMobile = function() {
        return ($('#regua-navegacao:visible').length > 0);
    };

    var preparePlayer = function(player) {

        var refreshPageWithTimeout = function() {

            console.log('Trying to refresh on' + graceTimerStep + ' ms.');
            setTimeout(function() {
                    if (!player.isPlaying()) {
                        refreshPage();
                    }
                    console.log('Watching a video. Refresh the page later');
                }, graceTimerStep);
        };

        var playerComplete = player.complete;
        if ($.isFunction(playerComplete)) {
            player.complete = function() {
                playerComplete.apply(this, arguments);
                refreshPage();
            };
        }
        else {
            player.complete = refreshPage;
        }

        var playerOnPause = player.onPause;
        if ($.isFunction(playerOnPause)) {
            player.onPause = function() {
                playerOnPause.apply(this, arguments);
                refreshPageWithTimeout(player);
            };
        }
        else {
            player.onPause = refreshPageWithTimeout;
        }

        var playerOnStop = player.onStop;
        if ($.isFunction(playerOnStop)) {
            player.onStop = function() {
              playerOnStop.apply(this, arguments);
              refreshPageWithTimeout();
          };
        }
        else {
            player.onStop = refreshPageWithTimeout;
        }
    };

    var refreshPage = function() {
        if (!isMobile()) {
            console.log('Refreshing now');
            window.location.reload();
        }
        else {
            console.log('Is mobile: Not reloading the page.');
        }
    };

    var checkForVideoPlaying = function() {

        console.log('Timeout: Refreshing the page at any moment.');

        clearTimeout(timerId); // clear timer

        var isVideoPlaying = false;

        $.each(WM.PlayerManager, function(index, player) {
            isVideoPlaying = isVideoPlaying || player.isPlaying();
            if (player.isPlaying()) {
                preparePlayer(player);
            }
        });

        if (!isVideoPlaying) {
            refreshPage();
        }

    };

    var startTimer = function() {
        timerId = setTimeout(checkForVideoPlaying, refreshTime);
    };

    $(document).ready(function() {
        if (!isMobile() && window.location.hash != '#debug' ) {
            console.log('Time Started: ' + refreshTime + ' ms until Refresh.');
            startTimer();
        }
    });

})();
</script></body><!-- Página gerada em 24/03/2017 20:24:31 --></html>

        (function () {
            var jqueryTimeout;
            var JQUERY_TIMEOUT = 1000;

            var jqueryTimeoutSetup = function() {
                jqueryTimeout = window.setTimeout(postJquerySetup, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
            };

            var postJquerySetup = function() {
                if(typeof $ !== 'undefined' && typeof CardDeVideos !== 'undefined') {
                    var initCard = function() {
                        new CardDeVideos('#card-de-videos-82bba99f-8aa2-46e0-8ed1-fd3e39fbcd5f');
                    };
                    initCard();
                    clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                } else {
                    if(document.readyState !== 'complete') {
                        jqueryTimeoutSetup();
                    }
                    else {
                        clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                        console.log('[Card de Videos] Jquery ou CardDeVideos não foi carregado.');
                    }
                }
            };
            postJquerySetup();
        })();

                    Saiba como andam 23 promessas de campanha de Pimentel
                </p></div></a><ul class="card-lista-item-set"></ul></div></div></section></section><section data-track-category="cards" data-track-action="lista" class="gui-card card-lista"><header class="gui-card-title gui-color-primary-bg"><h1 class="gui-text-title"><a data-track-click="clique | titulo" href="http://especiais.g1.globo.com/minas-gerais/transito/radar-transito-agora.html" class="gui-card-title-link" title="TRÂNSITO EM BELO HORIZONTE">

        </span></a></li></ul></div></div></section></div><!-- gerado em: 2017-03-26T02:36:49Z --><div class="bastian-card-mobile"><section id="widget-card-programacao" class="gui-card widget-card-programacao glb-style-card-programacao--globominas "

            <i class="gui-icon gui-icon-arrow-right2"></i></a></footer></div><script type="text/javascript">
        (function () {
            var jqueryTimeout;
            var JQUERY_TIMEOUT = 1000;

            var jqueryTimeoutSetup = function() {
                jqueryTimeout = window.setTimeout(postJquerySetup, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
            };

            var postJquerySetup = function() {
                if(typeof $ !== 'undefined' && typeof CardDeVideos !== 'undefined') {
                    var initCard = function() {
                        new CardDeVideos('#card-de-videos-3be9b884-2781-41be-9e71-07f501f64335');
                    };
                    initCard();
                    clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                } else {
                    if(document.readyState !== 'complete') {
                        jqueryTimeoutSetup();
                    }
                    else {
                        clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                        console.log('[Card de Videos] Jquery ou CardDeVideos não foi carregado.');
                    }
                }
            };
            postJquerySetup();
        })();
    </script><div data-track-category="cards" data-track-action="videos" class="gui-card card-de-videos glb-hl-style-card-videos-g1--globo-horizonte" id="card-de-videos-255a6b5d-300a-4dab-985c-8f53f6800a5b"><header class="gui-card-title gui-color-primary-bg"><h3 class="card-de-videos-custom"><a class="gui-text-title"

            VEJA MAIS vídeos DO GLOBO HORIZONTE
            <i class="gui-icon gui-icon-arrow-right2"></i></a></footer></div><script type="text/javascript">
        (function () {
            var jqueryTimeout;
            var JQUERY_TIMEOUT = 1000;

            var jqueryTimeoutSetup = function() {
                jqueryTimeout = window.setTimeout(postJquerySetup, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
            };

            var postJquerySetup = function() {
                if(typeof $ !== 'undefined' && typeof CardDeVideos !== 'undefined') {
                    var initCard = function() {
                        new CardDeVideos('#card-de-videos-255a6b5d-300a-4dab-985c-8f53f6800a5b');
                    };
                    initCard();
                    clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                } else {
                    if(document.readyState !== 'complete') {
                        jqueryTimeoutSetup();
                    }
                    else {
                        clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                        console.log('[Card de Videos] Jquery ou CardDeVideos não foi carregado.');
                    }
                }
            };
            postJquerySetup();
        })();
    </script></div><div class="publicidade publicidade-banner_rm3"><div id="banner_rm3" class="tag-manager-publicidade-container"></div></div></div></div><div class="row"><div class="areatemplate-inferior

                    Nordeste

                  media="screen"
                  href="//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/css/barra-globocom.min.css"
                  type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript">(function(){glb.barra={exibeAssineJa:true,exibeCentral:true,iframe:false};var s=document.createElement("script");s.type="text/javascript";s.async=true;s.charset="utf-8";s.src="//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/js/barra-globocom.min.js";var ss=document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];ss.parentNode.insertBefore(s,ss);})();</script><script type="text/javascript">
(function() {
    'use strict';

    var timerId ; // Current timer handler
    var refreshTime = 300000; // 1000*60*5
    var graceTimerStep = 10000; // 1000*10

    var isMobile = function() {
        return ($('#regua-navegacao:visible').length > 0);
    };

    var preparePlayer = function(player) {

        var refreshPageWithTimeout = function() {

            console.log('Trying to refresh on' + graceTimerStep + ' ms.');
            setTimeout(function() {
                    if (!player.isPlaying()) {
                        refreshPage();
                    }
                    console.log('Watching a video. Refresh the page later');
                }, graceTimerStep);
        };

        var playerComplete = player.complete;
        if ($.isFunction(playerComplete)) {
            player.complete = function() {
                playerComplete.apply(this, arguments);
                refreshPage();
            };
        }
        else {
            player.complete = refreshPage;
        }

        var playerOnPause = player.onPause;
        if ($.isFunction(playerOnPause)) {
            player.onPause = function() {
                playerOnPause.apply(this, arguments);
                refreshPageWithTimeout(player);
            };
        }
        else {
            player.onPause = refreshPageWithTimeout;
        }

        var playerOnStop = player.onStop;
        if ($.isFunction(playerOnStop)) {
            player.onStop = function() {
              playerOnStop.apply(this, arguments);
              refreshPageWithTimeout();
          };
        }
        else {
            player.onStop = refreshPageWithTimeout;
        }
    };

    var refreshPage = function() {
        if (!isMobile()) {
            console.log('Refreshing now');
            window.location.reload();
        }
        else {
            console.log('Is mobile: Not reloading the page.');
        }
    };

    var checkForVideoPlaying = function() {

        console.log('Timeout: Refreshing the page at any moment.');

        clearTimeout(timerId); // clear timer

        var isVideoPlaying = false;

        $.each(WM.PlayerManager, function(index, player) {
            isVideoPlaying = isVideoPlaying || player.isPlaying();
            if (player.isPlaying()) {
                preparePlayer(player);
            }
        });

        if (!isVideoPlaying) {
            refreshPage();
        }

    };

    var startTimer = function() {
        timerId = setTimeout(checkForVideoPlaying, refreshTime);
    };

    $(document).ready(function() {
        if (!isMobile() && window.location.hash != '#debug' ) {
            console.log('Time Started: ' + refreshTime + ' ms until Refresh.');
            startTimer();
        }
    });

})();
</script></body><!-- Página gerada em 25/03/2017 20:31:58 --></html>
